CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. B7 reads: "Class Play Held At Fifth - The senior class play, entitled "A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court," was presented last week at Fifth Avenue High School. Above, left to right, are Henry Harper, Ted Andrews and Paul Patton as they were viewed by the audience, enacting their roles. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seniors, from left: Henry Harper, Ted Andrews and Paul Patton, performing "A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court," Fifth Avenue High School
